pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, March 24, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Brussels, Belgium

Private meetings

8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in official arrivals at the NATO Summit.

NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the NATO leaders’ family photo.

Agora, ground floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council meeting.

Council Room 1, ground floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the European Council, Charles Michel.

Canadian Mission
Tower B, floor 5      
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 leaders’ family photo.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 leaders’ meeting.

Conference Room 12, ground floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Press Briefing Room, Public Square
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
